website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech G933 Artemis Spectrum is a great-sounding, comfortable wireless gaming headset that supports a startling number of platforms.
pros: USB receiver and included cables can work with nearly any game system
cons: Doesn't include a case or stand
Surround sound isn't effective in a headset

customer_reviews.title: Theyre great until you run into the dreaded power switch issue
customer_reviews.text: these headphones sound great for gaming and i would still be using them now happily, but for one massive flaw in the design. the headphones use this horrible tacky little plastic switch to turn on, and over time it can and will start to cut out audio on the left ear cup unless you fiddle with it or bash the ear cup hard. there are videos on how to fix it, but at most it seems temporary and i couldnt get it to work at all even with wd40 electrical cleaner. im selling mine now as faulty and getting something else by a different company that does not use such a badly designed power switch.
customer_reviews.author: D. Counter

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WIRELESSLY ON XBOX ONE AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: This headset is NOT compatible for wireless use with Xbox One as advertised. This listing and it’s title states wireless for use on Xbox One but when I could not get it to work on my Xbox One I checked out the Logitech website and it states this headset is compatible with all consoles EXCEPT the Xbox One. So thanks for ruining my sons birthday present through his disappointment when this gift would not work for him. Will never trust Logitech again.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: mostly good but...
customer_reviews.text: it was good, but... microphone is kinda far from mouth and can't be adjusted to be closer to mouth, people complain that they can hear me like I am far away even after I increase the input volume ti maxim, after new driver updates from logitech (automatic update of Ghub) I start to have connection problems between the headset and the PC, kinda sad, have to return
customer_reviews.author: Eugeniu Lupu

customer_reviews.title: Headphones god / mic bad...it will break
customer_reviews.text: Had my second set of these just stop working like the first. Mic stops working. Funny thing I used a cheap pair of headphones and friends said the mic sound 100% better. I have nmot noticed the sound deteriorate since swapping to the £20 set:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality Headset.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headset. The response delay it's close to zero, and it will have no impact at all using cable or wireless. The range is about 5 to 10 mts, without having obstacles, it won't work from one side to another of a wall. The battery lasts very very long, average 10-12 hs without recharging and using it actively. However it has minor impact as it comes with an USB cable so you just plug it in and keep gaming. The dial and buttons around are kinda useless and you never will use it, maybe the dial but they are hard to find and press therefore it's not important
customer_reviews.author: DannyBP@AWS

customer_reviews.title: A decent wireless headset but mic might be a deal breaker for some
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Wireless Software EQ is handy. Battery life is good. Cons Worst Mic I have ever used and everyone on coms will notice how poor it is. Logitech needed to do better on this for the price you pay. RGB lights are pointless killing the life of the battery. Headset is heavy after hours of gaming. Ear cups are okay but get hot on long sessions. Surround sound is terrible and I honestly cant think of reason why someone would use it. Price is a little high
customer_reviews.author: C.Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great headset that works flawlessly whether you use it as a wired or wireless headset. Sound quality is great and the distance for the wireless connection is quite large so you can take it with you around the house if you like. Battery life is pretty good, you get 12-13 hours if you turn the lights off on the headset. Very comfy to wear aswell for long periods of time!
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, nice that you can stow the receiver in the side. Don't think the lights are any benefit to the user, as only viewable from the rear. All controls are on the left rear, with the volume control just below the power switch. It is possible to power off while lowering the volume as its a sliding switch. Sounds are clearly hard from whatever direction they originate, making it easier to identify targets. Also has 3.5 Jack so can be used as normal headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated!
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with these as I have struggled to get them to work on the Xbox One. I can now get them to work on the PS4 after 4 weeks of trying! I am hoping that it lasts! I had ordered 2 of these for both sons but I am currently trying to return the unopened pair due to the problems with them. I do know of others that have these headset and have worked fine for them, and are good quality. Low stars because of the issues I have had with them.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Pieri

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself a whole lot of trouble and buy the Arctis 9x
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend for starters Logitech customer service is a joke so any technical difficulties you have and you will have them will not be resolved they are definitely not a friendly bunch either and spend most of their time speaking to you like you are a utter fool they have zero manners. The audio is great to start with till it starts fading in and out 6 months down the line it does not work wirelessly with Xbox and have fun trying to figure out what equaliser you are using if your not a pc gamer, the volume control is similar to that of a small boy trying to learn to pee standing up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: But it's got flashy lights on so all's good right? The package works to a point
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a fairly decent bit of kit.What I do have a problem with is the software. I'm a native English speaker living abroad.I would prefer my software package in my native tongue.Logitech don't allow for this.They will give you a 'region friendly' version. Logitech 'contact us' is a complete joke. There is no customer support. No customer support and limited software choices. But it's got flashy lights on so all's good right? The package works to a point ,but I'm feeling I'm not getting the full benefits due to the weird choices Logitech have made. At least I can make the lights the same colour as my Corsair mouse and Razer keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: rusty buckets

customer_reviews.title: Good headset overall few minor design flaws. App is Hopeless.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy build. Bad positioning of buttons. Always seem to end up pressing random buttons when placing and removing headset also microphone is not easy to acess. It has good battery longevity. and a decent 10m range. Ear cuffs are not as comfortable as could be. One new thing to contend with is the LGhub app that is installed on your computer. this is hopeless and causes more problems than anything. I uninstalled the app it kept disabling the headset sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good durability, great surround and bass
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very durable, it's my first headset thats lasted me over a year Decent quality sound, good bass Wireless has good connection and range and doesn't require bluetooth Cons: It has an auto-turnoff feature if you don't play sound for about 5-10 minutes Expensive (worth it imo for the durability) No 360 sound Edit: After installing the logitech headset software, 360 can be enabled and auto turnoff disabled
customer_reviews.author: derkregin

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but battery life isn't the best.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones however there are a few issues. They can sometimes disconnect from your computer if it's been sleeping and a reboot won't sort it. You need to pull the battery pack out to hard reset them. There's also an issue with battery. If you want the fancy lighting, it's going to absolutely nuke your battery. Good thing really because the lighting is completely out of sight anyway while wearing so you might as well not have it on but still you can probably get 8-10hrs battery out of them at a time. Nice to have them wireless for nipping to the kitchen while still listening to games though!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but I wouldn't buy today as there are better options.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I've had this headset for quite a while now and it's served me well. I am upgrading now to a wired headset which has better sound quality but this has served me quite well since I bought it. Battery life does tend to get worse as you use it for a long while but I've learned to just plug it in while using when it starts to beep.
customer_reviews.author: ThatProgrammer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset.
customer_reviews.text: After weeks and weeks of reading reviews for wireless gaming headsets, I finally decided on these, and I'm glad I did. These are soo comfy and the sound once tweaked is awesome, I love this headset. I was very skeptical after reading some of the reviews, but I took the plunge and actually ordered a cheaper priced set from Amazon warehouse, they are pristine condition and like I said, they are great to use, for both movies and gaming.
customer_reviews.author: PsyaNyde

customer_reviews.title: Gamers must have headset
customer_reviews.text: I have no dislikes whatsoever as this headset is fantastic. Before I purchased them I did a lot of research and as you know it's still a gamble but I think I have won. I use these for PC gaming, tablet gaming and surprisingly listen to music (for headsets and music don't usually work well together). The software for the headset gives an extra dimension of use. Very comfortable no sweat probe due to breathable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: Utter trash - avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: In the year I've owned this product I've had countless problems with it. I wouldn't mind this too much if Logitech had any form of reasonable product support, but they don't. Expect the product to break Expect to receive copy and paste answers from support. Definitely don't expect the same member of staff to respond to any replies you send them, if you get a response it'll be another member of staff telling you to do the same things as the first. Currently in a long and drawn out battle with Logitech to get my money back for this worthless junk so I can buy a SteelSeries (or something else).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. T. Hutchon

customer_reviews.title: Great for between three to five months...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first set of these in November 2017. In February 2018 I tried to get help from the manufacturer due to a faulty power button with no response. I contacted Amazon and they offered me a refund or replacement. I opted for a replacement as they're pretty useful. The second set lasted five months this time until the same problem with the power switch happened so it's a pretty safe assumption this is inherent. I've opted for a refund this time and I'm getting a different set from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. J. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: DON'T update firmware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the headset for a little under a week, all going fine....Until I tried updating the firmware through Logitechs own software and well...it bricked the headset. Amazon are sending out a replacement, but just a slight warning.
customer_reviews.author: Tactical Hotdog

customer_reviews.title: battery last longer than it says.
customer_reviews.text: at first i got them. didn't sound right (in discord and ts) on the mic. you have to turn off surround them so sound normal the mic sounded funny to people. sound/recording/advanced and change it from telephone quality (why it goes here i donno) to DVD quality. i went from a strix TRUE 7.1 to this and wouldn't go back the battery life is great. 12 hour max with no lights on? nope. i have ran mine for 12 hours without lights and i still have 7 hours remaining. it must depend on how high your volume is. ((4 months and its fked)) hope this helps you all :)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Only had 1 Issue.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on cyber monday! I personally only game with these headphone, usually games like CSGO and other FPS. I don't really notice to much difference sound wise but the mic is pretty good! They are super comfortable and havent given me any pain/discomfort while wearing them after a number of hours. I wish they supplied a spare battery with the headset! The only issue I encountered was the headphones kept disconecting but this was fixed by plugging the receiver into a different USB socket.
customer_reviews.author: Bishen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great directional sound for FPS gaming
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for playing PUBG, and it does not disappoint for locating the precise direction of enemy gunfire. It excels when trying to locate enemy footsteps - not just horizontally but vertically too. It's comfortable to wear, easy to use, and the sound is great. It doesn't offer great noise cancellation, as if someone is in the same room as me, I can still hear them moving around / talking. The only cons about this headset is the wireless / RGB combo. If you're wearing it, you can't see the RGB lights - it's often best to disable the lighting in the Logitech software, as it drains the battery and requires charging more often.
customer_reviews.author: alexf@aws

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this headset
customer_reviews.text: headset looses connection all the time firmware updates are a nightmare & fail all the time then when the last one finally worked it bricked my headset now its totally dead logitechs support is horrendous basically sent me a troubleshooting list to work through and said if none of these work then contact your seller my seller is amazon and its over a year old so it just points me to logitech support page back to square 1 last time i ever buy anything made by this company
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, that is at pre-set I have not ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound, that is at pre-set I have not even tried to change it. Wireless connection perfect. Also mic perfect, folds away nicely, turns on and off as you move it in/out which is good. Easy to set a button to mute the mic also. PC interface is very good, check battery power and change settings all good. Change lights etc too, I guess, but I don't care about that. Loses a star because they are not as comfortable as I had hoped, you really know you have a big set of headphones on. They also make your ears warm up after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkmoon269

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, solid with good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Various settings and good quality for fraction of the price compare to other top brands. Batteries holding good charge if You willing to switch off all the LEDs. Very comfy for me but its personal choice so try before buy. Large diameter membranes provide solid bass for all explosions needed while watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Krystian Sysa

customer_reviews.title: HIGH END HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolutely fabulous top quality and amazing sound quality, it ca be a little heavy but it is really well constructed and feels quality, good for streaming and has a lot of features built in
customer_reviews.author: John Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, Love them. can make the top of your head a little sore after 3-5 hours continous use but I expec that from ANY gaming headset, just repossition and they are find for another 3-5 hours use I cant stress how good these are for the money
customer_reviews.author: Remus

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headset. I really enjoy the DTS surround. Also, the sound quality is really good. They also stick on your head and your ears won't sweat as easy. I had a man o war before and I definetely recommend the G933 over the Razers.Really pleased with them ! If they keep turning off every 4-5 minutes just stop the rgb or leave them on a static color.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Avoid logitch headsets.
customer_reviews.text: Logitechs support service is non existant. These stupid headphones have had the same freaking problems since they were released, constant disconnection, changing of settings, blocking change of settings and won't update unless booted manually through the command prompt via admin mode
customer_reviews.author: Sir-Joby

customer_reviews.title: I doubt there are better headphones
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because we had heard they worked with the Nintendo Switch - which they did (both the headphones and the microphone) - but they were also superb on lots of other levels. The sound (not just for gaming but things like listening to music), the comfort levels, even the look - with the almost infinite variety of decorative colours generated by the LED display - everything was perfect. A quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing in the G933 many updates for the firm wear not all of them fixed first time, many issues with the sound and also battery dying or just the software not working, when they worked it was great, but most of the time they just gave up and refused to work
customer_reviews.author: Celtskyline

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is decent wireless range is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Have had so many problems with this headset from day one having to reinstall drivers to the head set and ever since just problems with it waking up, wireless and sound settings changing. Pros - Its comfortable, wireless, battery last long, the mic is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Loose design which is a shame but otherwise a solid pair of gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good looking headphones but suffer from loose ear-pieces which can rotate around (and do) frequently. Other than that they are amazingly comfortable (I have worn mine for 6 hour stretches) and have excellent sound quality which is easily adjustable with the provided software. Slightly concerned at the batteries charge length (it doesn't seem to be staying charged for the 12 hours promised in the literature - big surprise there!) but it comes with a super long USB charging cable which makes the time on charge a non-event.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Collingwood

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for gaming
customer_reviews.text: really nice comfortable headset for gaming, mic is fine (so my friends in game tell me). not an audiophile but sounds good to me when playing music. Fairly prompt delivery from the seller so thumbs up on that side too. Very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: MR G A SMITH

customer_reviews.title: 2* disappointed
customer_reviews.text: not going to be long. headset itself is good; great quality, great surround sound, good mic quality, but bad at actually lasting. in my case being the boom mic suddenly stopped working and wouldnt mute or unmute when i lift it up or down, in other words its unresponsive. which is a shame for paying a 160 GBP for a headset that broke a month later. 5 days after return expired.. i could return the headset i would. P,S i take care of my things, so it wasnt my fault it broke, i think logitech should start producing more reliable products, because this is my second logitech product that broke out of no where.
customer_reviews.author: Matas

customer_reviews.title: CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this, or you will be let down. It will stop working on you, first wirelessly, then wried, untill its just more plastic waste that's going to a landfil becuase Logitech couldn't create a decent headset that would last.
customer_reviews.author: AAB

customer_reviews.title: Costalot but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but worth it. The quality of sound is excellent. There are no signal drops as I believe was a problem with previous versions. On the down side I have difficulty with the control buttons on the left earpiece, when I try to adjust the volume I occasionally hit a control button by mistake. For my usage I have found it easier to disregard the buttons and just use the volume control and the on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last - terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Only had it 6 months when the battery stopped charging , after spending £160 odd and only works properly for little while i am very unhappy with logitech whose customer support is absolutley terrible , they keep ignoring every email i send them. Will never buy from logitech again , got a 5.1 surround sound system which keeps dying on me too
customer_reviews.author: Calum Roberts

customer_reviews.title: So impressed.
customer_reviews.text: They are so easy to connect straight out the box. I was impressed from the get go. They are quite large due to the need for the circuitry in there but I got used to the bigger size within minutes. The different sound settings are great and I never had any connection issues. I actually sent mine back due to a faulty battery, but by no means will that affect my view of this product. I'm sure it was a one off, but a worth while investment none the less.
customer_reviews.author: ss10.

customer_reviews.title: ... used it with my PS4 thus far but really love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it with my PS4 thus far but really love these headphones, snug fit for my small head without the headphones feeling like they're taking over my whole head. The sound is great and from what I can tell the quality of the mic is fine too. The only thing is that there's no way to visually tell the battery life and it is a bit on the short side compared some other wireless headphones, but as I have the wires close by any way​ it isn't something that bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: superb and really clear
customer_reviews.text: these have been a great headset. i have managed to drop them on the floor, my cat has knocked them off the table and they are still going strong. One tip, if you want 14 hours or more battery life, turn off the rgb lighting. I stream so my headset needs to be good and people keep asking me what i use , because the audio is so clear
customer_reviews.author: FibroWolf

customer_reviews.title: 2 years on and still great
customer_reviews.text: Had this headset a couple of years now, still as good as the day it arrived, fantastic sound, makes gaming really enjoyable, very comfortable even after a few hours of Battlefield, would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have bought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this beauty around 3 years ago. Having no wires hanging down is one of the best things, can freely walk around the house and still be able to hear my PC. Has quite a bit of different sound settings, Dolby surround is my fav. Only downside of this headset is the size.
customer_reviews.author: DEDE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Difficult to beat
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. These were chosen by my son for his birthday. He did a lot of research before choosing these. There are so many out there but these are brilliant. He is particularly pleased with the easy access to the controls. They are so comfortable even when placed over the wearers glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort and looks great with the light up logo.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his headset and he's had many but these are his favourite great sound and very comfortable, the charging cable is long if you need to charge them while gaming there's plenty of cable. My son said he would definitely buy these ones again. (Long time gamer) oh and the Logitech sign on each side of the headset lights up when in use and can changes colour.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra mulraney

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but still the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect but still the best on the market, add up the great customer service and reliable guarantee and its still worth its price. I wish the earbuds were still made of leather and could do with better sound quality and stop flashing when turned off on the charger :(
customer_reviews.author: luanda11

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set sound wise
customer_reviews.text: Great quality set sound wise . Only 3 stars up to connectivity issues. First couple of weeks no issues. Constantly need to take SUB out to get connection. Recently there was firmware update and it's stuck on it. After that USB connectivity issues, so I'm charging only when pc is off, as sound of pnp is just too much when I'm playing. If no connectivity issues I will give 5.
customer_reviews.author: Master2382

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic for premium price
customer_reviews.text: I received a used (returned ) headset felt cheap from start to end returned within 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Volume wheel stops working properly.
customer_reviews.text: The volume wheel just stopped working. Mine are less than 2 months and I used them weekends, less than casual. Forget Logitech, this price product and they just put an analogic wheel that starts to behave wrong, up is not longer up, oscillates between the numbers of volume randomly. Is a joke. I put the box into the garbage too soon otherwise I'll return it. Now I have to live with the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Ferri

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: AUDIO IS GREAT.....but you can't actually use the mic on the head set when using the 3.55mm headphone jack you have to use the crappy in line mic so I'll defo be sending these back & when in wireless mode all the can hear is static
customer_reviews.author: cal oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset the sound was great for playing FPS and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset the sound was great for playing FPS and even just listening to music on the go around the house, my issue was that I went through 2 of these bad boys, the first one came loose at the headphone speaker and the second died like legit died, when I turned it on it wouldnt go off until the battery was removed. Im sure it was the firmware that was wiped and the device did not respond to anything. since got a refund and went back to using my old G930's which are still powering through battery is meh but still alive
customer_reviews.author: Ceefloor

customer_reviews.title: Such amazing sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have been through a few headsets. None of them have been close to as good as this one. The sound is amazing. This headset would be great for any gamer. You hear every sound like it's in the room with you. I would definitely recommend it. You will want to turn the light off, that way a charge will last three times as long.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Bahrij

customer_reviews.title: It's a great headset, the lights are easily configurable and feels ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headset, the lights are easily configurable and feels comfortable on the head and the sound is ok. BUT the headset has huge problems with Windows 10 and requires a lot of flaffing around resetting and dealing with drivers and firmware to get it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Firmware nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Can not recommend these. Plagued by constant firmware updates (which crash 50% of the time) almost daily. Mic issue of not reactivating after muting has not been fixed for almost a year now. Headset needs constant restarting. Thoroughly regret buying these. Such a shame as I like a lot of Logitech products but they dropped the ball on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Swagglepuss

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, with simple to use software available
customer_reviews.text: Last headset was chewed up by my German Shepherd. Its nice to have something I can switch between my PC and Xbox One relatively seamlessly. Comfy enough too. Software works fine too for remapping keys and setting RGB.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Then i tried it on an old Windows 7 laptop and the quality was disgusting.. For the price it was still not ...
customer_reviews.text: My Windows 10 didn't want to update this product no matter how many ways i tried! Then i tried it on an old Windows 7 laptop and the quality was disgusting.. For the price it was still not worth it... (RETURNED)
customer_reviews.author: Rob Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Logitech has atrocious support and the product has a manufacturing flaw with the power button which messes with sound quality, you can read about it in forums, many users experience a lot of problems with this device. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: this headset it ok the mic quality isn't the best ive had £10 headsets with better quality mic but ...
customer_reviews.text: this headset it ok the mic quality isn't the best ive had £10 headsets with better quality mic but in my opinion the wireless is very good except the fuzz sound when the speakers kick in this is a bit disappointing but when you have it connect through wired the sound quality is very good but because of the quality of the mic its only 3 stars 4 months after receiving it it broke on the pivot point just by putting them on and also had constant software issues which to be fair on constantly updating and fixing also this product broke after 3 months do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My son's christmas present , he wears them constantly and loves the mic, especially the flip up mute function. I've listened to the surround sound which is spookily effective. He also likes having more than one source active at any one time. His one gripe is the bluetooth transmitter which needs a usb power source to work, this gets cumbersome with an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Jolly Good
customer_reviews.text: Got £20 off asking price, and according to reviews these are pretty much as good as the later gen 935. So well happy
customer_reviews.author: StuartMc

customer_reviews.title: OK not brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Feel well made, comfortable, fair amount of sound bleeding to and from so this could either be a pro or con depending on what your after. The software that comes with this head set is just straight up terrible. And for gaming mobas which I mainly play, the mic is very hissy, for over 100 quid you would expect a decent mic.
customer_reviews.author: Nekky

customer_reviews.title: I got 2 replacement for these over the past 2 years, I won't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of these over the past 2 years, they all barely last for a year. All of them started to having problems with the turn on/off button, one or both of the speakers just wouldn't give proper sound. The last one I have just started to losing signal, sometimes every minute. The original warranty expired as it is not extended when you get a replacement so neither amazon nor logitech is willing to replace it. I was a bit disappointed when I realised that the USB cable connection is for charging only. I wouldn't recommend this item at all, poor quality for this money which can't even last for one and a half year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my good friends old dying headset. He said it took seconds to set up and get running and worked so much better. Great sound quality, effective sound cancelling (since he no longer has to hear his GF complain when he's gaming), great battery life and really durable.
customer_reviews.author: James Lalor

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: i return it.. too heavy after a while i had to take them out.for this money you can buy something else.i took xcloud 2 its not wirlesss but they have much better sound
customer_reviews.author: Billakos

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Way too poor of a quality for its price. Hinges are already making annoying noises, battery gets depleted even if you don't use the headsets. They are uncomfortable. The cable is useless (when you connect your headphones with it, it gives really bad sound quality overall. You can't connect them wireless to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Gabriel Frigea

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and noise cancellation, very good for gaming but also for movie , if you choose 7.1 logitech signature
customer_reviews.author: Fanel1296

customer_reviews.title: Can slide off your head quite easily if not pushed far enough back at an angle ...
customer_reviews.text: Can slide off your head quite easily if not pushed far enough back at an angle which can lead to a pain on the top of your head after a while. Wireless function started playing up after 4 months of use and no response from Logitech support despite contacting them twice within 4 weeks. Would definitely go for a more reliable brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MJY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming love the feel of quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gaming love the feel of quality, sound is great as is range if I want to sit on sofa listening to music, I would recommend these to any gamer or anyone who likes to listen to their favourite music 😁
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: But can honestly say this is the best headset I have ever owned well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many a headset from cheap £20 jobs through most of the corsair range and a sennheiser or two, But can honestly say this is the best headset I have ever owned well worth the money. Audio is just perfect there really is nothing I can fault about it the lighting although arguably pointless looks really good and the software is so easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, incredible battery life (especially if you dim ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, incredible battery life (especially if you dim the LEDs a bit), and snazzy look. Only problem is I'd say the build quality feels a little bit racketty, and I can't say I'd be surprised if the plastic broke a few times like it did on my G930's. Luckily, Logitech support has always been easy to deal with warranty wise, and if something does go wrong I wouldn't expect any issues having them sort you out.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love the headset - Sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the headset - Sound quality is amazing. KNOWN PRODUCT DEFAULT : The head rest WILL come off - you will have to stick this back on. From research, Logitech will just replace the item, but not fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not all that
customer_reviews.text: Update bricked my first set Amazon sent me another. Range is less than 5 metres. Quality of sound is below my expectations. Build quality also below my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, buy these gamers.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these headphones....everything about them sceams quality. Just a note, when i used them with my mac. the Logitech software doesnt work with them....but you can still use them in audio options. There is no latency with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable headset
customer_reviews.text: Setup was quick and easy and a lovely looking headset with or without the rgb! Only problem I had was the mic should've muted and unmuted itself when you raised it and lowered it. It didn't do this every time. Returned it for a new one. A+
customer_reviews.author: Linky2018

customer_reviews.title: Not For Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Had to give it 1 star only because of the misinformation found in the description. As much as this advertised as compatible with an Xbox one and it also advertises as wireless it's not. It only works with the cable. The rest of the console wireless apparently works. Can't rate because of sound/ quality but for first impressions looking at it and setting it up it looked really good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Good headset, comfortable after broken in... make sure to set the microphone quality to DVD as its default on Phone quality and this is why it may seem like the mic is trash. Wireless range is decent but bad through walls... sound is also pretty decent but overall not a headset for me as i'd expect much better quality in all aspects for 140 quid... Also the earcups give me a rash so not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha

customer_reviews.title: Which i loved and was the best headset i owned
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Corsair Vengeance headset! Which i loved and was the best headset i owned! Sound wise and quality. Until they broke :( I decided to slightly upgrade the sound quality this time with the Artemis Spectrum! The sound is incredible!! not matched in my opinion! The range is also better than my previous headset! The only CON is that the band on the top of your head is thinner than my previous, and can hurt after prelonged perioids of time on the top of your head. ( almost digging in ) as its quite thin but still very padded.
customer_reviews.author: Robtay

customer_reviews.title: All the other features are awesome. Battery works good after 2 months at least
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it needs a reset. Strange because software should be able to do that. Having that huge amount of buttons should server for a reset as well instead of having to use needles to perform the reset. If the price had been lower then resetting with a needle could have been acceptable. All the other features are awesome. Battery works good after 2 months at least!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, the most comfortable headset i have ever use by far. You will also have a weird transition when u are looking for that imaginary wire. Sadly no bass setting, not sure is it a hardware or software design problem. Range is also not so great (within a brick wall house)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, upgraded from the g930's and they are better in every way, slightly tight but I'm assuming they will loosen up after some use. Turn the lighting off for best battery life, with it on they drain annoyingly quick.
customer_reviews.author: ben collins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived quickly and well packaged. The headset is my first wireless headset and is excellent for use with the computer. The multi input feature us particularly nice for uninterrupted sessions being able to answer calls or even use Siri on my phone while gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Simon. F

customer_reviews.title: but the perceived quality of the materials and construction is not as good as other headphones I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound, but the perceived quality of the materials and construction is not as good as other headphones I have owned. 3 months down the line they are still working and sounding great
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very good, hardest part was downloading the gaming software (from ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good, hardest part was downloading the gaming software (from the Logitech web site) to adjust the controls - I think Logitech need to look at there website and try some of the links out. Sound quality really good - I will be in conference mode on it most of next week
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Quite heavy but good make
customer_reviews.text: They are not exactly as expected however I can still use them and got them at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gaming headsets
customer_reviews.text: The sound is incredible. Listen to music is great and the surround sound during gaming is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. You can spend less than half of what these cost and get just as good sound. They feel fragile and cheap. Stay away. Rip off.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones, Sound is Awesome. Had a sync problem after firmware upgrade, support had me do some "by the book" procedure, and then suggested maybe to replace the headphones. replacing it is a huge trouble for me and only after 3 days??? But, as for now, it seems it was only one time problem, so maybe it was computer related, but i did not like logitech support answer, when i had these headphone less the two days. (if i could i would take half a STAR, 4.5 , cause of logitech support) eventually, all is OK, the headphones is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Eran

customer_reviews.title: Cool design though like most Logitech
customer_reviews.text: Microphone was a let down to the product and especially for the price given. Cool design though like most Logitech gadgets
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: One of the best !
customer_reviews.text: Great for gaming and skype . Good battery life and 7.1!
customer_reviews.author: Gaz

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality poor construction
customer_reviews.text: While a great headset for audio quality it has issues with poor construction, i have had mine for about 7 month and the on and off switch has started to become highly faulty and within days of use the soft pad on the top of the headset started coming off. For £128 i expected abit more longevity and highly disapointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: AVERAGE, theyre NOT fully wireless for xbox one!
customer_reviews.text: just try and drink a can of gaming size redbull whilst wearing these, 😂🤣😂🤣😂🤣
customer_reviews.author: Manwithaplan

customer_reviews.title: the G933 pleases me very much
customer_reviews.text: as with the previous Logitech headsets that I have owned this newer version is outstanding, clear and very comfy after a few nights in game, yes very tight at first over the head but soon fitting very well. I know there are some slightly better but more expensive options out there but for the price you pay for this headset its well worth it. Love it for both games and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kemp

customer_reviews.title: customer service is useless, now past the 12 months and I'm guessing ...
customer_reviews.text: stop working within a year, customer service is useless, now past the 12 months and I'm guessing they won't fix it. do not be fooled by the price, you are not paying for quality and you are not paying for a good customer experience.
customer_reviews.author: arjun r.

customer_reviews.title: My only issue is with the Logitech software and windows ...
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is with the Logitech software and windows updates because since the last ones sometimes it doesn't work properly and you need to reset them in order to work well again
customer_reviews.author: Ztromy

customer_reviews.title: Just got it, but seems good.
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is great, however when using dolby surround turns tinny and echoy and doesnt sound good at all (using dts is far better in quality). Build feels solid, but was disappoint that the plastic didnt feel hugely high quality, but not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with those
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with those. excelent sound and works like a charm on both console and PC. Get one of those if you got Playstation or PC. Cables are required if you need to use them on xbox one
customer_reviews.author: Todor Argirov

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bit of kit!!
customer_reviews.text: I disputed for a while whether to get the artemis or the man o war. Boy was I right picking these: -Long range -PS4 and PC wireless compatible plug and play -Comfortable and strong headband -Nice volume control -Great quality mic -Surround sound is cool bonus -Great RGB lighting effects -Great design Just wish that the battery, although long, could be longer due to the amount of hours I put in to gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You do not need much to say.
customer_reviews.text: The best headset I've ever used. As someone who previously used Plantronics GameCom 788 and Corsair Void Wireless, I can easily say that this earphone has the best experience compared to others. It may be a bit heavy and rough, but all of these are acceptable for a wireless and RGB illuminated headset. Thin EQ and DTS settings are easy thanks to LGS. Thanks to Amazonat first for BF sale deal and Logitech for making such a wonderful Gaming Headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset. Not super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and shuts out noise well, while also having a great battery life, however the one draw-back is the head pad can hurt if not sitting right for too long.
customer_reviews.author: BasVegasJames

product_meta.title: Logitech G933 Artemis Spectrum Wireless Gaming Headset, DTS 7.1 Surround Sound, 40mm Pro-G Drivers, 2.4 GHz, 3.5 mm Audio Jack, Lightsync RGB, G-Keys, PC/Mac/Xbox One/PS4/Nintendo Switch - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackTake your gaming to the next level with The Logitech G933 Wireless Gaming Headset Artemis Spectrum.With the choice between wireless or wired connectivity, the customisable gaming headset is compatible with multiple platforms, use with your gaming console and switch effortlessly to connect to your mobile device and experience all-around, high quality audio.Powered via a battery housed in the right ear cup, users will experience enhanced audio from the G933 Artemis Spectrum wireless headset. When not in use, the gaming headset simply plugs in via the USB port on the bottom of the unit to charge. For the optimal experience, plug in your unit and allow it to charge fully before first use.The Logitech G933 Artemis Spectrum features a helpful critical battery warning as well as an idle sleep mode to help conserve battery. The wireless headset will go into sleep mode after 5 minutes with no audio signal as well as alerting users during gaming when charge is running low, and thanks to the Logitech gaming software, users can keep an eye on their power of their headset with the battery charge level indicator.

BOX CONTAINS
Performance gaming headset;3.5 mm analogue cable with audio controls;RCA to 3.5 mm cable;3.5 mm to 2.5 mm audio adapter;USB data/charging cable;USB powered wireless mix adapter;Custom tags (left/right);2-year manufacturer's guarantee and full product support
feature_bullets: Enhanced All-Around Audio : Enjoy your favourite music and expansive in game sound with the G933 Gaming Headset from Logitech. Delivering clean and accurate highs as well as deep rich bass
Wireless and Wired Connectivity : Play lag-free on 2.4 GHz wireless for up to 12 hours per headsetcharge, or use the 3.5mm analogue input without using the battery
Multi-Platform Compatibility : The G933 is the one gaming headset for all your devices, take it from your gaming consoles to your mobile devices with ease
Fully Customisable : Create the best gaming headset for you with Logitech gaming software and customise lighting, audio and buttons to fit your gaming
Multi-Source Audio : The wireless headset allows you to continue gaming while taking phonecalls and playing music
Requirements : Windows 7 or later, macOS X 10.10 or later

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars4,898 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
